        <script>
            function is_browser() {
                return (
                    navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Chrome") !== - 1 ||
                    navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Opera") !== - 1 ||
                    navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Firefox") !== - 1 ||
                    navigator.userAgent.indexOf("MSIE") !== - 1 ||
                    navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Safari") !== - 1 ||
                    navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Edge") !== - 1
                );
            }

            function not_excluded_page() {
                return (
                    window.location.href.indexOf("/unsupported-browser/") === - 1 &&
                    document.title.toLowerCase().indexOf('page not found') === - 1
                );
            }

            if (is_browser() && ! window.atob && not_excluded_page()) {
                window.location = location.protocol + '//' + location.host + '/unsupported-browser/';
            }
        </script>


		<script>
			var modern_tribe = window.modern_tribe || {};
			modern_tribe.fonts = {
				state: {
					loading: true,
					active: false
				},
				events: {
					trigger: function ( event_type, event_data, el ) {
						var event;
						try {
							event = new CustomEvent( event_type, { detail: event_data } );
						} catch ( e ) {
							event = document.createEvent( 'CustomEvent' );
							event.initCustomEvent( event_type, true, true, event_data );
						}
						el.dispatchEvent( event );
					}
				}
			};
			var WebFontConfig = {
																custom: {
					families: ["Agenda Med Cond","Agenda Reg","Agenda Bd","Agenda Bd Cond"],
					urls: ["\/\/cloud.typenetwork.com\/projects\/1873\/fontface.css\/"]				},
								loading: function () {
					modern_tribe.fonts.state.loading = true;
					modern_tribe.fonts.state.active = false;
					modern_tribe.fonts.events.trigger( 'modern_tribe/fonts_loading', {}, document );
				},
				active: function () {
					modern_tribe.fonts.state.loading = false;
					modern_tribe.fonts.state.active = true;
					modern_tribe.fonts.events.trigger( 'modern_tribe/fonts_loaded', {}, document );
				},
				inactive: function () {
					modern_tribe.fonts.state.loading = false;
					modern_tribe.fonts.state.active = false;
					modern_tribe.fonts.events.trigger( 'modern_tribe/fonts_failed', {}, document );
				}
			};
			(function ( d ) {
				var wf = d.createElement( 'script' ), s = d.scripts[ 0 ];
				wf.src = 'https://oberlin.cafebonappetit.com/content/themes/bamco/js/vendor/webfontloader.js';
				s.parentNode.insertBefore( wf, s );
			})( document );
		</script>

																			<label class="site-panel__cafenav-control" data-js="site-panel__cafenav-control">Halal
											<input type="checkbox"
													class="site-panel__cafenav-control-checkbox"
													data-js="site-panel__cafenav-control-checkbox-diet"
													value="halal"
																								/>
											<span class="site-panel__cafenav-control-indicator"></span>
										</label>

								</div>

							</div>

							<div class="site-panel__cafenav-filter-block site-panel__cafenav-filter-block--exclude site-panel__cafenav-filter-block--exclude-none">


								<div class="site-panel__cafenav-toolbar">

									<button	class="c-btn-text-alt" data-js="site-panel__cafenav-toolbar-button--reset">
										Clear Filters
									</button>

									<button	class="c-btn" data-js="site-panel__cafenav-toolbar-button--apply">
										Apply Filters
									</button>

								</div>

							</div>

						</div>

					</div>

				</div>

			</div>

		</div>




			</section>

					<header class="s-header">

				<h2 class="site-section__title h2" data-name="title" data-livetext data-depth="0" data-index="0">FOOD RECOVERY VERIFIED</h2>


			</header>



    <div class="s-content site-panel__wysiwyg-section">

        <div class="g-row g-row--flex g-row--center g-row--col-2--min-medium"
             data-depth="0"
             data-name="columns"
             data-livetext>

<div class="c-card g-col g-col-style--white">



	<div class="c-card__content">





<div class="c-card__desc" >

<div class="t-content wysiwyg__content" >
	<p>Bon Appetit at Oberlin is fighting food waste and hunger by  recovering surplus perishable food from our campus that would  otherwise go to waste and donating it to people in need through <a class="c-btn-text" href="http://www.oberlincommunityservices.org/">Oberlin Community Services</a></p>
<p>Learn more about <a class="c-btn-text" href="https://www.foodrecoverynetwork.org/frv/">Food Recovery Verified</a> and<br />
<a class="c-btn-text" href="http://www.bamco.com/timeline/food-recovery-commitment/">Bon Appetit’s food recovery efforts</a>.</p>

</div>

</div>



	</div>
</div>


<div class="c-card g-col g-col-style--white">



	<div class="c-card__content">





<div class="c-card__desc" >

	<figure class="wp-image wp-image--no-caption aligncenter"><img class="size-full wp-image-11844" src="https://oberlin.cafebonappetit.com/content/uploads/sites/288/2018/05/new-frv-sticker-01-1-1-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" /></figure>

</div>

</div>



	</div>
</div>

				</span>
			</button>

				id="about-your-food"
				tabindex="0"

								data-modular-content>



			<div class="g-row g-row--no-gutters g-row--col-2--min-full ">

			<div class="g-col site-panel__imgtxt-col-img">


<div class="c-image c-image--rect">
			<div  role="img" aria-label="cafebonappetit" data-expand="200"   data-sizes="auto" data-bgset="https://oberlin.cafebonappetit.com/content/uploads/sites/288/2018/06/Healthy-salad-with-grilled-chickenkale.beets-and-goat-cheese-505829084_1400x1050-760x570.jpg 760w 570h,
https://oberlin.cafebonappetit.com/content/uploads/sites/288/2018/06/Healthy-salad-with-grilled-chickenkale.beets-and-goat-cheese-505829084_1400x1050-1070x802.jpg 1070w 802h" style="background-image:url('https://oberlin.cafebonappetit.com/content/themes/bamco/img/theme/shims/component-card-lg.png');"  class="c-image__bg lazyload">






	</div>
</div>


			</div>

			<div class="g-col g-col--vertical-center site-panel__imgtxt-col-content">

				<div class="site-panel__imgtxt-content">


<h2
		class="h2 panel__title site-panel--imagetext-title"
		>

	Eat Right — For You

</h2>

					<div class="site-panel__imgtxt-body t-content">

						<p dir="ltr">Do you care about whether your food was grown locally or raised humanely? Or are you more interested in protein vs. carbs?</p>
<p dir="ltr">Whatever your priorities, we can help you chew the right thing. At Bon Appétit, we’re working toward “food service for a sustainable future.” How we define that is a <a href="/wellness/#panel-its-all-connected">mouthful</a>, but the bottom line is that we strive to cook delicious food that’s good for you, the animals, the workers, the community, and the Earth — because they’re all connected. And we’re proud to be the <a href="/wellness/#panel-its-all-connected">first food service company to tackle many important issues</a> in these areas.</p>
<p dir="ltr">We’re here to support you by giving the information you need to choose wisely. Visit our <a href="/wellness/">Wellness page</a> for a feast of information about the roles our <a href="/wellness/#panel-our-kitchens">from-scratch cooking</a>, <a href="/wellness/#panel-our-well-being-commitments">nutritional approach</a>, <a href="/wellness/sustainability/local-food">local sourcing</a>, and other sustainability programs can play on <em>your</em> menu.</p>


					</div>


<a class="c-btn-text site-panel--imagetext-cta"
			href="/wellness/"
			target="_self"
		>
			<span class="c-btn__text">Wellness Page</span>
	</a>


				</div>

			</div>

		</div>




			</section>

				id="menu-mail"
				tabindex="0"
				data-index="17"
				data-js="panel"
				data-type="wysiwyg"
									data-jump-nav-title="Menu Mail"
					data-url-key="menu-mail"
								data-modular-content>

			<div class="l-container">


					<header class="s-header">

				<h2 class="site-section__title h2" data-name="title" data-livetext data-depth="0" data-index="0">Subscribe to Menu Mail</h2>


			</header>



    <div class="s-content site-panel__wysiwyg-section">

        <div class="g-row g-row--flex g-row--center g-row--col-2--min-medium"
             data-depth="0"
             data-name="columns"
             data-livetext>

<div class="c-card g-col g-col-style--white">



	<div class="c-card__content">





<div class="c-card__desc" >

<div class="t-content wysiwyg__content" >
	<figure class="wp-image wp-image--no-caption aligncenter"><img class="wp-image-10382" src="https://template.cafebonappetit.com/content/uploads/sites/3/2018/05/NEW_MM_subscribe_img_FINAL-654x1024.png" alt="" width="400" height="627" /></figure>

</div>

</div>



	</div>
</div>


<div class="c-card g-col g-col-style--white">



	<div class="c-card__content">





<div class="c-card__desc" >

<div class="t-content wysiwyg__content" >
	<script>
	jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
		var cafe_select = $('#bamco-newsletter-subscription-cafes');
		cafe_select.select2({width: '100%'});
		cafe_select.bind( 'change', function( event ) {
			if ( typeof(event.added) == 'undefined' ) {
				return;
			}
			if ( event.added.id == 'all' ) {
				unselect_every_option_but_all();
			} else {
				unselect_all_option();
			}
		});
		var unselect_every_option_but_all = function() {
			cafe_select.select2('val', ['all']);
		};
		var unselect_all_option = function() {
			var val = cafe_select.val();
			var new_val = [];
			for ( var i = 0 ; i < val.length ; i++ ) {
				if ( val[i] != 'all' ) {
					new_val.push(val[i]);
				}
			}
			if ( val.length != new_val.length ) {
				cafe_select.select2('val', new_val);
			}
		};
	});
</script>
<div style="display: block;">
    <div class="bamco-newsletter-form-left">

             data-depth="0"

			<section class="panel s-wrapper site-panel site-panel--accordion"
				id="new-for-2018-2019"
				tabindex="0"
				data-index="20"
				data-js="panel"
				data-type="accordion"
									data-jump-nav-title="New for 2018-2019"
					data-url-key="new-for-2018-2019"
								data-modular-content>

			<div class="l-container">


					<header class="s-header">

				<h2 class="section__title h2" data-name="title" data-livetext data-depth="0" data-index="0">Changes to Campus Dining </h2>


			</header>



	<div class="s-content">
		<div class="g-row"
			 data-depth="0"
			 data-name="accordions"
			 data-livetext
		>
			<div
				class="g-col"
				data-depth="0"
				data-name="content"
				data-autop="true"
				data-livetext
			>
				<p><a href="https://dining.oberlin.edu/">Campus Dining Services</a> has increased flexibility and options for students.  These changes reflect Oberlin’s continued commitment to provide a diverse range of high-quality food selections and prevent food insecurity.   Please remember that the economics of campus dining cannot be captured by dividing the cost of the meal plan by the number of meals &#8211; labor and other “out of sight&#8221; expenses contribute to the total cost.   If you’d like to understand more about this important program, please contact <a href="mailto:meredith.raimondo@oberlin.edu">meredith.raimondo@oberlin.edu</a> or visit the Dining Committee for more information.</p>

			</div>
			<div class="g-col">

<div
	class="c-accordion"
	role="tablist"
	aria-multiselectable="true"
        	id="accordion-5cd9714ce0a8a"
	data-js='c-accordion'
>
			<div class="c-accordion__row">
			<button
				aria-controls="accordion-content-5cd9714ce05e3"
				aria-expanded="false"
				aria-selected="false"
				class="c-accordion__header"
				id="accordion-header-5cd9714ce053f"
				data-index="0"
				role="tab"
			>
                				<span
					class="c-accordion__header-inner"
					data-depth="0"
					data-name="title"
					data-index="0"
					data-livetext
				>
					Meal Plan Flexibility
				</span>
			</button>

			<div
				aria-hidden="true"
				aria-labelledby="accordion-header-5cd9714ce053f"
				class="c-accordion__content"
				id="accordion-content-5cd9714ce05e3"
				role="tabpanel"
			>
				<div
					class="c-accordion__content-inner"
					data-depth="0"
					data-name="row_content"
					data-index="0"
					data-autop="true"
					data-livetext
				>
					<ul>
<li>Students on full board (300 meals a semester) may swipe up to four times each day (with no time restrictions) in both the traditional dining halls or Grab-and-Go locations.</li>
<li>An expanded Grab-and-Go program offers students the opportunity to swipe for a sandwich or salad, two sides (your choice of fruit, chips, or fresh-baked cookie) and fountain beverage at Wilder DeCafe, Lord Saunders, and Azariah’s Café&#8211;and look for the soon-to-open café at Stevenson Biggs.</li>
<li>Dining Services is now cashless.  For your convenience, credit cards are now accepted at DeCafe, Azariah’s Café, and all dining halls.</li>
</ul>

				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
			<div class="c-accordion__row">
			<button
				aria-controls="accordion-content-5cd9714ce0735"
				aria-expanded="false"
				aria-selected="false"
				class="c-accordion__header"
				id="accordion-header-5cd9714ce068d"
				data-index="1"
				role="tab"
			>
                				<span
					class="c-accordion__header-inner"
					data-depth="0"
					data-name="title"
					data-index="1"
					data-livetext
				>
					Other Dining Changes
				</span>
			</button>

			<div
				aria-hidden="true"
				aria-labelledby="accordion-header-5cd9714ce068d"
				class="c-accordion__content"
				id="accordion-content-5cd9714ce0735"
				role="tabpanel"
			>
				<div
					class="c-accordion__content-inner"
					data-depth="0"
					data-name="row_content"
					data-index="1"
					data-autop="true"
					data-livetext
				>
					<ul>
<li>Perlick Commons at the Science Center now offers full-time vending options where visitors can enjoy coffee, beverages, and snacks.  For those who wish to use a meal swipe for refreshments while studying in this area, Wilder DeCafe is just across the street and offers a range of to-go options.</li>
<li>To support the economic sustainability of the dining program including the commitment to local foods and fair compensation for employees, board swipes can no longer be used to purchase retail goods at DeCafe.  Board swipes continue to be available for purchase of grab-and-go options. To ensure access to the foods you want, we encourage you to explore the expanded menu or request the addition of your favorite items.</li>
</ul>

				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
			<div class="c-accordion__row">
			<button
				aria-controls="accordion-content-5cd9714ce087c"

					Stevenson Dining Hall
				</span>
			</button>

			<div
				aria-hidden="true"

				<div

					data-depth="0"
					data-name="row_content"
					data-index="2"
					data-autop="true"
					data-livetext
				>
					<ul>
<li>Expanded seating is now available at Stevenson Hall for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.  Enjoy lunch on the balcony at Stevenson or a more intimate setting in one of the side dining rooms.</li>
<li>The Create-Your-Own Sandwich and Salad counter has been relocated from Wilder DeCafe to Stevenson Hall and will be available Monday to Friday at lunch.  Use a meal swipe and either take your sandwich to go or dine in and enjoy the complete menu at Stevenson.</li>
</ul>

				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

					<ul>
<li>Wilder DeCafe is now open for breakfast at 7 am with coffee, oatmeal, breakfast grab-and-go, coffee and other favorites. An expanded 4<sup>th</sup> Meal will be served out of Wilder this year.  DeCafe will be open 7 nights a week until 12 midnight, while the Rathskeller will offer 4<sup>th</sup> meal options Sunday through Thursday.</li>

                    // http://stackoverflow.com/a/36054483/3059883
                    var $search_tab = $( ".media-menu-item" ).filter( function () {
                        return $( this ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf( search_text.toLowerCase() ) >= 0;
                    }).last(); // Returns the first element that matches the text. You can return the last one with .last()
                    $search_tab.trigger( 'click' );

                    $("iframe").load(function() {
                        $(this).contents().find('.media-sidebar').addClass('open-featured');
                    });

                });
